title: WANTED N162 GOODWIN CHAMPION Kelly - get big bucks to help during the holidays
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: WANTED N162 GOODWIN CHAMPION Kelly - get big bucks to help during the holidays
posts.post_content:
Can't believe I am still having trouble wrapping up this set :-)

Finally make the big decision to let it go.

VG/X to EX

>Finally make the big decision to let it go.

Does this mean you're looking to sell what you've got? If so, I'd be interested.

just an endless refrain looking for the final card I need to wrap up the set. I've managed to keep this final group together since selling most of the set on eBay in 2000. I once owned a Kelly but sold it as it was somewhat out of register....

I'M STILL LOOOOOKING.

Gotcha. Good luck on your search. I'm wrapping up the n28 baseball run myself, just need 2 more and then I was thinking about going for this run. Seems like it could get a little difficult / pricey at this point...

the N28 and N29 long ago - both nice sets but a bit mono-chrome when compared to the N162 and N184. I sold the two A&G sets but framed the album and I'm quite happy as they're up on the wall to be appreciated. Recently completed the master set of the Kimball's and Kelly the last N162 I need. Coupled with my indian set and world's smokers - I'm just about done except for that damn N43 I need...... Two cards are standing between me and let's say a more meditative state with regard to the hobby I love.
